prompts.name: quick_repo_check
prompts.description: Quickly check a GitHub repository's basic information and recent activity
prompts.template:
Please analyze the GitHub repository {{repo_name}}:

1. Get basic repository information
2. List recent commits (last 10)
3. Check open issues count
4. Review README content if available

Provide a summary of the repository's current state and activity level.

prompts.name: build_troubleshoot
prompts.description: Troubleshoot a failed Jenkins build with detailed analysis

arguments.name: build_number
arguments.description: Build number to analyze (use -1 for latest)

arguments.name: include_logs
arguments.description: Whether to include build logs in analysis

prompts.template:
Analyze the Jenkins build failure for job '{{job_name}}'{{#build_number}} build #{{build_number}}{{/build_number}}:

1. Get build status and basic information
2. {{#include_logs}}Retrieve and analyze build logs
3. {{/include_logs}}Identify potential failure causes
4. {{^include_logs}}Get build summary without detailed logs
5. {{/include_logs}}Suggest troubleshooting steps

Provide actionable recommendations to resolve the build issues.
